attributes.action: intercede to end the uncertainty that is damaging for the whole community around the proposed closure of St Johns Church of England School Bollington
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In December 2007 Cheshire county concil suggested that St John's school should close and they have failed to take the school into formal consutation due to local goverment reorganisation and have failed to take full account of the childrens best intrests
